title: Introducing: ULYSSE
content:
Belgian trio ULYSSE combine a whole myriad of influences into their debut EP, U as in ULYSSE.

From the Klaxons meets MGMT groove of Wounds, to the King Krule-esque drawl of Voodoo Romance, passing through the almost Alex Turner inspired delivery on Thunder. It’s an EP grounded amongst it’s electronic leanings, yet seemingly drawing from a host of other sources, ultimately ending up with a listen that’s as immersing as it is endearingly disjointed.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
